contentBlocks.excerpt: The promotion of health and social development for their people is a central purpose of governments that all sectors of society share.
contentBlocks.rationale: Defines shared responsibility between institutions and individuals as an ethical obligation toward societal well-being.
contentBlocks.notes: From Article 14 of the UNESCO Universal Declaration on Bioethics and Human Rights (2005).
